name: Replo
headline: Replo helps companies sell more on the internet
description: Replo helps companies sell on the internet. We do this by helping marketing teams automate building and testing customer journeys using data and AI.

founders.name: Yuxin Zhu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Replo (YC S21). Previously EM @ Uber, UC Berkeley

founders.name: Noah Gilmore, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Replo (YC S21). Previously engineering at PlanGrid, Yelp, UC Berkeley

generated_description:
Replo is a San Francisco-based startup that was founded in 2021 and made its way through the Y Combinator Batch S21 program. With a lean team of about 20 employees, Replo's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to help companies sell more online. They focus on simplifying the customer journey for marketing teams by integrating data and AI to automate the building and testing of marketing funnels.

At its core, Replo provides a suite of tools tailored for Shopify users, including a user-friendly landing page builder, analytics, A/B testing, and content AI that optimizes content for various campaigns. This combination allows brands to create compelling pages quickly and effectively without needing advanced technical skills. They boast a template library of over 500 designs, enabling users to deploy high-quality, market-proven templates with just a few clicks.

The company targets various verticals, from e-commerce sectors like health, beauty, consumer electronics, to sports and apparel. Brands and agencies alike are leveraging Replo to optimize their marketing strategies. With over 5,000 Shopify brands already trusting their platform, Replo is positioning itself as a go-to solution for digital marketing and e-commerce prowess.

In the competitive landscape of online selling, Replo stands out by catering specifically to the needs of Shopify users, allowing them to rapidly test and iterate on campaigns without the overhead of traditional web development. So if you’re a Shopify brand looking to elevate your online presence, Replo seems like a solid option to explore. You can find more about them on their website: [Replo](https://replo.app/).
